channel.title: SethScape 508
channel.description:
SethScape 508: This server is my own base (reconfirgured the whole coding implements), this server is for all players, skills, quests, and more...
This server is set to Runescape - like preference.
I will be adding pictures shortly but im here to give a short description of the features up to date.
FEATURES:
All 24 skills trainable.
3 Quests: Dragon Slayer, Vampire Slayer, and Imp Catcher.
DESCRIPTION: The Dragon Slayer Quest is like Runescape's but slightly easier, The Vampire Slayer is like Runescape's but slightly easier with a SethScape twist, as for Imp Catcher which is the most recent one i developed is somewhat like Runescape's you must collect the 4 bead's from the thief's of SethScape , this quest requires alot of walking around and good map location information. Plus 10,000,000 coins.
Good Economy.
DESCRIPTION: The Economy is based on a standard runescape private server, meaning it is somewhat easy and somewhat hard to earn money... it has its pros and cons.
Random Event.
DESCRIPTION: The Random Event is based of Runescape's Damien workout random event, but with SethScape's twist... the prize is decent
HOW IT WORKS: I've created a bunch of random timer's subsiquental to the random event, it is not as hard to get as Runescape's but decent...
Smithing:
DESCRIPTION: I've added a full smithing supplement only for rune smithing (dragon smithing) it requires 99 smithing in order to smith, the rune bar requirements are between 3 - 26.
Censored Words:
DESCRIPTION: I've added a censoreship system which blocks out all bad words.
Summoning Combat:
DESCRIPTION: Well it's not much to discuss but the max combat is 138 with summoning combat...
Sets:
DESCRIPTION: There is a set's shop located at ::shops which allows you to use a hammer to get a full set subsequental to the set you have bought.
MORE TO COME... let me know what you think about this project, i regularily update it, there is obviously more to this server... but there minor updates and what not... COMMENT!

item.title: SethScape 508
item.dc:creator: @sethscape508 sethscape508
item.description:
@sethscape508 wrote:

SethScape 508: This server is my own base (reconfirgured the whole coding implements), this server is for all players, skills, quests, and more…

This server is set to Runescape - like preference.

I will be adding pictures shortly but im here to give a short description of the features up to date.

FEATURES:

All 24 skills trainable.

3 Quests: Dragon Slayer, Vampire Slayer, and Imp Catcher.

DESCRIPTION: The Dragon Slayer Quest is like Runescape’s but slightly easier, The Vampire Slayer is like Runescape’s but slightly easier with a SethScape twist, as for Imp Catcher which is the most recent one i developed is somewhat like Runescape’s you must collect the 4 bead’s from the thief’s of SethScape , this quest requires alot of walking around and good map location information. Plus 10,000,000 coins.

Good Economy.

DESCRIPTION: The Economy is based on a standard runescape private server, meaning it is somewhat easy and somewhat hard to earn money… it has its pros and cons.

Random Event.

DESCRIPTION: The Random Event is based of Runescape’s Damien workout random event, but with SethScape’s twist… the prize is decent

HOW IT WORKS: I’ve created a bunch of random timer’s subsiquental to the random event, it is not as hard to get as Runescape’s but decent…

Smithing:

DESCRIPTION: I’ve added a full smithing supplement only for rune smithing (dragon smithing) it requires 99 smithing in order to smith, the rune bar requirements are between 3 - 26.

Censored Words:

DESCRIPTION: I’ve added a censoreship system which blocks out all bad words.

Summoning Combat:

DESCRIPTION: Well it’s not much to discuss but the max combat is 138 with summoning combat…

Sets:

DESCRIPTION: There is a set’s shop located at ::shops which allows you to use a hammer to get a full set subsequental to the set you have bought.

MORE TO COME… let me know what you think about this project, i regularily update it, there is obviously more to this server… but there minor updates and what not… COMMENT!
